name: Bayonet Punisher
desc:
Apply these effects (in sequence), depending on the card types among the “Borrel” monsters on your field and in your GY, also, if you control a monster with 3000 or more ATK, your opponent cannot activate cards or effects in response to this card's activation. You can only activate 1 "Bayonet Punisher" per turn.
• Fusion: Banish 1 monster your opponent controls.
• Synchro: Banish 3 random cards that are face-down in your opponent's Extra Deck.
• Xyz: Banish 1 Spell/Trap your opponent controls.
• Link: Banish up to 3 cards from your opponent's GY.
